content: this gorgeous rectangle shells of one-color blanket works up so quickly and can be made for babies or adults for the home or even if your pet needs a new blanket this pattern has over 39 photos and 15 pages to help guide you though making this blanket this blanket pattern also includes 4 starting lengths to help you customize your blanket i also have a free tutorial on this blanket available on my youtube channel jonna martinez you will need any worsted weight yarn you like for this pattern and an h 5 00mm crochet hook if you would like to use another kind of yarn you are welcome to and the stitch work will still work but your blanket will be different size than mine please message me here or contact me on my facebook or instagram page for help with this pattern i am always happy to help jonnamartinezcrochet
